overview.base: You can passively smell the types of all living creatures within 30 feet. You can detect dead and undead creatures as well, but you cannot distinguish within or between them. They all smell like death. You also gain Scent Seeing. You can not detect odorless creatures in this way.

You know the exact location of all target creatures. You continue to know the location of all targets within 10 feet, whether they are or you are moving or not, so long as they are still within 10 feet of you.

system.requirements: You are not anosmatic and the target is not odorless.

overview.base: You gain 15 temporary HP and become frenzied.
overview.proficient: You gain an additional 5 × P temporary HP and gain Fast.
overview.fluent: You instead gain an additional 5 × F temporary HP and gain Swift.

system.endCondition: You die or 1 minute passes without combat.

overview.base: Your mouth counts as a weapon for the purposes of abilities that target or are delivered by it (although it cannot be shattered or destroyed). You may attack with it and its damage die is now [[/roll 1d4]].
overview.proficient: The damage die is instead [[/roll 1d6]].
overview.fluent: The damage die is instead [[/roll 1d8]].

overview.base: You dig at quarter speed.
As you attack, choose either arm or leg. The damage gets dealt accordingly.

results.hit: The target takes 1 hack damage on either an arm or leg, depending on what you chose.
results.critHit: The target takes 2 hack damage on either arms or legs, depending on what you chose.

results.hit: Target takes a body hack.
results.critHit: If you want, target takes standard damage as well.

overview.base: You gain Offensive Martial Arts and Defensive Martial Arts.

Your hands count as weapons for the purposes of abilities that target or are delivered by (although they cannot be shattered or destroyed). You may attack with them and their damage die is now [[/roll 1d4]].
overview.proficient: The damage die is instead [[/roll 1d6]].
overview.fluent: The damage die is instead [[/roll 1d8]].

overview.base:
Your hands count as shields for the purposes of abilities that target them (although they cannot be shattered or destroyed). You may block with them and their BV is +1.
Note: This does not make your hands blocking.
You cannot use items in your hands.

results.hit: Target takes a vitals hack of your choice.
results.critHit: If you want, target takes standard damage as well.
